textbook.title: Internet and World Wide Web "How to Program"
textbook.author: Deitel Inc
textbook.description: This book is to introduce readers with little or no programming experience to the exciting world of Web-based applications.

textbook.title: Getting Started with Arduino
textbook.author: Massimo Banzi OReilly
textbook.description: This valuable little book offers you lots of ideas for Arduino projects and helps you get going on them right away.
